text: Svetozar Glushkov (born 23 November 1939) is a Russian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:People from Slavgorod
title: Svetozar Glushkov
